original_text: And it came to pass after the plague, that the Lord spake unto Moses and unto Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest, saying,
korean_text: 염병 후에 여호와께서 모세와 제사장 아론의 아들 엘르아살에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass after the plague,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 역병 후에 그 일이 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: that the Lord spake unto Moses
and unto Eleazar the son of Aaron the priest,
